p: As it can be seen in Figs. 1A, 1B and 2A, 2B, although the relative amounts of FAs measured by UPLC-MS and GC-FID are different, there exist significant correlation between them. Spearman rho = 0.908 and 0,918 for sunflower GC-FID and UPLC-5 and GC-FID and UPLC-400, respectively. Spearman rho = 0.979 and 0,947 for rapeseed GC-FID and UPLC-5 and GC-FID and UPLC-400, respectively.
